RapidFit:
////////////////////////////////////////// // Reference file for fit to data //////////////////////////////////////////
//========================================== // Specify which minimiser to use.
Minuit NegativeLogLikelihood
1
//========================================== // Specify the fit
//................................... // This applies a constraint on deltaM //................................... // This applies a constraint on deltaM
deltaM 17.77 0.12
// .................... // Attempt to constrain LLscan on the amplitudes
ATOTAL 1.0 0.00001
// .................... // Attempt to constrain GH and GL positive
GLandGH 0.0 0.00001
//================================================ // Formal Parameters to be fitted or fixed
timeResolutionScale 1.0 Fixed unitless
//.......................................... // True Physics Parameters for signal
gamma 0.77 1.5 0.0 Free ps^{-1}
deltaGamma 0.0 Free ps^{-1}
Aperp_sq 0.30 0. 1. Free Unitless
Azero_sq 0.50 Free 0. 1. Unitless
As_sq 0.00 0. 1. Fixed Unitless
delta_para 3.1 6.3 -6.3 Free Unitless
delta_perp -0.17 -3.3 3.3 Free Unitless
delta_zero 0.0 -3.3 3.3 Fixed Unitless
delta_s 0.0 -3.3 3.3 Fixed Unitless
deltaM 17.77 Free ps-1
Phi_s 0.0 Fixed Unitless
// Angular acceptance factors
angAccI1 0.978305 //0.978305 Fixed Unitless
angAccI2 1.03132 //1.03132 Fixed Unitless
angAccI3 1.03268 //1.03268 Fixed Unitless
angAccI4 -0.0000318417 //-0.0000318417 Fixed Unitless
angAccI5 -0.000219174 //-0.000219174 Fixed Unitless
angAccI6 -0.000171136 //-0.000171136 Fixed Unitless
angAccI7 1.0 Fixed Unitless
angAccI8 0.0 Fixed Unitless
angAccI9 0.0 Fixed Unitless
angAccI10 0.0 Fixed Unitless
//+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //2010 additions
// 2010 Mass model
// Signal Mass parameters for double Gaussian mass model
f_sig_m1_2010 // Fraction of first Gaussian 0.83 0.0 1.00001 Fixed Unitless
sigma_m1_2010 // Gaussian width in MeV 6.5 0.0 100.0 Free MeV/c^{2}
ratio_21_2010 2.14 1.0 10.0 Fixed MeV/c^{2}
m_Bs_2010 5365.5 Free MeV/c^{2}
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBT_2010 0.78 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBU_2010 0.72 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBT_2010 0.78 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBU_2010 0.72 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//............................................ // 2010 Background model
// Long lived lifetime components for double exponential model
f_LL1_2010 // Fraction of first exponential 0.989 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
tau_LL1_2010 // First exponent 0.236 0.01 0.5 Free Unitless
tau_LL2_2010 //Second exponent 1.5 0.05 3.0 Free Unitless
f_LL1_II_2010 // Fraction of first exponential 1.0 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
tau_LL1_II_2010 // First exponent 0.236 0.01 1.0 Free Unitless
tau_LL2_II_2010 //Second exponent 1.5 0.05 3.0 Fixed Unitless
//Exponential background mass model
alphaM_pr_2010 // exponent 0.00140 Fixed Unitless
//Long lived time resolution components
timeResLL1Frac_2010 1.0 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL1_2010 0.00 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL2_2010 0.00 Fixed Unitless
// 2010 mistag model
// Fixed Mistag for MP
mistag_2010 0.5 Fixed
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1_2010 1.0 Free
mistagP0_2010 0.338 Free
mistagSetPoint_2010 0.338 Fixed
// 2010 Detector Parameters
//Signal PDF time resolution parameters for double gaussian model.
timeResolution1_2010 0.0337 Fixed ps
timeResolution2_2010 0.0646 Fixed ps
timeResolution3_2010 0.180 Fixed ps
timeResolution2Fraction_2010 0.456 Fixed unitless
timeResolution3Fraction_2010 0.017 Fixed unitless
timeOffset_2010 //Leave at Zero, this is not used anywhere yet. 0.000 Fixed ps
// This applies a constraint on mistag scale
mistagP1_2010 1.01 0.12
mistagP0_2010 0.338 0.012
//======================================== // 2010 UN-BIASED TAGGED events
SignalFractionUBT_2010
Bs2JpsiPhi_SignalAlt_MO_v3 UseTimeAcceptance:True TimeAcceptanceType:Upper mistagP0:mistagP0_2010 mistagP1:mistagP1_2010 mistagSetPoint:mistagSetPoint_2010 timeResolution1:timeResolution1_2010 timeResolution2:timeResolution2_2010 timeResolution3:timeResolution3_2010 timeResolution2Fraction:timeResolution2Fraction_2010 timeResolution3Fraction:timeResolution3Fraction_2010 timeOffset:timeOffset_2010
BsMass f_sig_m1:f_sig_m1_2010 sigma_m1:sigma_m1_2010 ratio_21:ratio_21_2010 m_Bs:m_Bs_2010
LongLivedBkg_3Dangular f_LL1:f_LL1_2010 tau_LL1:tau_LL1_2010 tau_LL2:tau_LL2_2010 timeResLL1Frac:timeResLL1Frac_2010 sigma_LL1:sigma_LL1_2010 sigma_LL2:sigma_LL2_2010
Bs2JpsiPhiMassBkg alphaM_pr:alphaM_pr_2010
File $RAPIDFITDATA/2010-repro-Bs_260811_RapidFit.root sel DecayTree

Bs2JpsiPhiMassBkg alphaM_pr:alphaM_pr_2010
